ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We plunged with those who plunged
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And plunged into useless things with those who were obstinate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and we indulged in vain talk with those who indulged in vain talk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We indulged and persisted in useless disputes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And used to dwell on evil matters with those who think evilly.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And we used to speak falsehood with vain speakers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who entered into vain discourses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and we plunged along with the plungers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We used to wade (in vain dispute) with (all) waders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: we indulged in vain arguments along with those who indulged in them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we have been wading with the waders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We used to indulge in [profane] gossip along with the gossipers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But we used to talk vanities with vain talkers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we used to talk falsehood (all that which Allah hated) with vain talkers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We plunged in with the plungers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And we used to indulge with those who indulge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:45] And we used to delve, into falsehood, along with those who delved,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We used to wade (in vain dispute) with (all) waders) we used to indulge with the adherents of falsehood,
